about_the_game:
Ragtag crew? Check. Musical gear? Check. Tour bus and robot driver? Check. Stolen package? Check! Embark on a perilous road-trip across a Divided States of America. Use the power of words to shape relationships with your crew, get out of trouble and reach your final destination in Dustborn!



Get your hands on the Vision Tour Bundle to unlock the following digital content:
- Sherbet twirl hat
- EYE C U jacket
- Psycho Pete bat

content_descriptors.notes:
Rated ESRB M17+ with the following descriptors:
- Violence
- Mild Blood
- Strong Language
- Drug Reference
